mapper.select: SELECT B.iuser, A.nick, A.stored_pic AS loginedUserPic, D.iproduct, D.title, D.stored_pic AS prodPic, B.ireview, B.rating, B.`contents` FROM t_user A LEFT JOIN t_review B ON A.iuser = B.iuser LEFT JOIN t_product_payment C ON B.ipayment = C.ipayment LEFT JOIN t_product D ON C.iproduct = D.iproduct WHERE B.iuser = #{iuser}

SELECT A.updated_at AS updatedAt, A.iproduct, A.price, A.deposit, A.title, A.stored_pic AS prodPic, A.iproduct, A.iproduct, B.iuser AS loginedIuser, B.nick, B.stored_pic AS pic FROM t_product A LEFT JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE A.iuser = #{loginedIuser} ORDER BY A.updated_at DESC LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{rowCount}

select R.ireview, R.contents, R.rating, R.iuser, U.nick, U.stored_pic as userProfPic, P.iproduct from t_product P join t_product_payment PP on P.iproduct = PP.iproduct join t_review R on PP.ipayment = R.ipayment join t_user U on R.iuser = U.iuser where P.iuser = #{iuser} and R.contents != '' and R.rating > 0
